ghcn¶

Functions to read and work with data from GHCN

tenths of degrees Celsius to Fahrenheit

src.ghcn.get_ghcn_specs(file_type='stations')[source]¶

Gets the field specifications for a given file type :param file_type: the file type :type file_type: str

Returns:the field specifications (see ghcn_specs)
Return type:dict
